app.title: Color Compass
app.description: Extract color palettes from images and visualize color spaces in 3D using CIELAB model

palette.title: Extracted Palette
palette.placeholder: Select an image to generate palette.

tooltips.dominantColors: Control the number of colors in the palette.
tooltips.paletteSize: Control the maximum number of colors displayed in the palette. Increasing this value allows more colors, works with palette color count.
tooltips.maxHiddenColors: Control the maximum number of hidden colors (uncommon but important colors) recognized by the algorithm.
tooltips.minHiddenPercentage: Control the minimum pixel percentage threshold for recognizing hidden colors.
tooltips.superpixelCount: Control the number of superpixel regions generated by SLIC algorithm. Increasing this can improve palette color richness. Warning: Higher values significantly increase processing time.
tooltips.superpixelCompactness: Control the regularity of SLIC superpixel shapes. Increasing this can suppress similar color output in the palette.
tooltips.backgroundVarianceScale: Control the threshold ratio for background color matching. Increasing this improves background tolerance for neighboring colors.
tooltips.maxBackgrounds: Control the maximum number of background colors recognized by the algorithm.
tooltips.useDeltaE: Enable ΔE color distance calculation, more perceptually accurate but slower.

palette.spherePlaceholder: Select an image to generate 3D color sphere.

analysis.title: Color Analysis
analysis.tooltip: RGB to CIELAB cannot be converted directly. This implementation assumes sRGB input with D65 standard illuminant as reference white point, using standard gamma correction for linear RGB, standard matrix transformation to CIE XYZ, and CIE standard formulas to CIELAB.

advanced.title: Advanced Color Analysis
advanced.tooltip: Use polar coordinates and density distribution to display hue, saturation, value, and distribution features in CIELAB color space, helping to deeply understand the color composition of the image.

huePolar.title: Hue Polar Distribution
huePolar.tooltip: Display hue distribution on 360° color wheel in polar form. Center to edge represents frequency - fuller edges indicate more occurrence of that hue.

labScatter.title: Lab a* b* Distribution
labScatter.tooltip: Color scatter distribution on a* (Red-Green axis) and b* (Yellow-Blue axis) planes in CIELAB color space. Center (0,0) is neutral gray, extending outward indicates increased saturation.

distanceHeatmap.title: Color Distance Heatmap
distanceHeatmap.tooltip: Display color difference degree between image regions and extracted palette. Green indicates good color match with palette, red indicates larger differences, helps evaluate palette representativeness.

legend.description: (Shows average color difference for each region to nearest palette color)

labDensity.title: Lab Density Distribution
labDensity.tooltip: Color density heatmap on a* b* plane. Brighter colors indicate more pixels gathered, intuitively shows main color distribution areas of the image.

footer.privacy: We respect your privacy. This project is purely frontend, so all your data will be processed locally and not uploaded to any server (we don't have one!)

errors.notImage: Please select or paste an image file.
errors.invalidImageData: Unable to process image pixel data.
errors.imageLoadFailed: Failed to load image. Please ensure the file is a valid image format. Check console for details.
errors.noPalette: Palette data not generated, cannot export.
errors.noSphere: 3D color sphere not generated, cannot export.
errors.invalidSphereCanvas: Invalid 3D color sphere canvas size, cannot export.
errors.sphereExportFailed: Failed to export 3D color sphere image.

params.reset: Parameters have been reset to defaults.
